Name: [fast] TacO Markers
Description:
A set of markers and trails for some of the most profitable solo-farming gathering routes across a wide range of maps.
Click the Info button for current benchmarks and more details!

Name: Automatic Arrows
Description:
Struggling to find markers that have no trail? Tired of having to backtrack after a marker you just missed?
Look no further! Automatic Arrows is a helper script that can work with any other marker pack. It automatically generates arrows that point to the markers closest to you. Requires Lua Scripts to be turned on in Pathing settings.

Name: [MOAR] Marker Pack
Description: The MOAR Marker Pack aims to help players run efficient open world metas and Hero Point trains.

Name: [RACE] Beetle Racing Tracks
Description:
Description: A selection of tracks created and curated by the members of [RACE].

[RACE] Discord Link: https://discord.gg/wkJbRwA

Name: Abaddon
Description: EoD and LW1 set of markers to make achievement chasers' life easier, also has some QoL markers for EoD

Name: Czokalapik's Guides
Description: This marker pack is designed for Commanders leading HP trains and/or solo players (with small requirements). Very few challenges require Springer, original routes requiring only HoT masteries and/or gliding are not included for some Hero Challenges (for example Glided River).

Name: GW2 Twisted Castle
Description: Markers for the Twisted Castle (Wing 3) encounter. Features: Meta Pathing, Slower Intended Pathing, Buttons, and Gate Portals

Name: Heart Zones
Description: Zone outlines shown on your map for each of the hearts in-game.

Name: Hero's Marker Pack
Description: This pack provides skip guides, mechanical optimization, encounter strategy support, and general QoL markers for Fractals of the Mists, Raids, Strikes, and Dungeons, in addition to limited build support for SFTA. Individuals who are significantly experienced in end-game PvE content will see little to no use from this pack, and the same goes for brand new players. But if you're someone who doesn't fit in either extreme, then this pack will suit you well.
Categories: Fractals, Raids, Strike Missions, Dungeons, Builds

Name: Kresky's GW2 Markers
Description:
Currently only contains a Hero Point train for Heart of Thorns (Verdant Brink, Auric Basin and Tangled Depths).
The path is designed with the idea that anyone could follow as long as they have the Gliding Basics mastery (no other masteries needed aside from Itzel Poison Lore for 1 HP in Tangled Depths).

Name: Mad King's Labyrinth - Commander Pack
Description: This marker pack includes everything you need to know in order to learn how to command a Mad King's Labyrinth farm -- including trails, informational markers and even generic copy-paste messages for new commanders.

Name: Metal Marker Myriad
Description:
A collection of random marker packs for various collections, achievements, whatever! It's like a box of chocolates!

https://discord.gg/FP8dQj6KBj

Name: Movement on the World
Description: Take the scenic route and explore as you level up.

Name: Nekres' Hoard of Lost 'n Forgotten Markers
Description:
A collection of markers which at the time of creation were not covered by other packs.
Currently includes:
- Treasure Mushroom hiding spots

Name: Nexploration
Description: This marker and trail pack is for all y'all looking to map-comp all of Cantha and start building out those sweet new legendaries. I've also created a few extra trails as well, adding in mastery routes, JP's and some achievement routes. I may or may not add more routes in the future, just depends on personal time.

Name: Only Fish
Description:
A collection of known Fishing Hole spawn locations across all available maps, categorized by type! Never sail aimlessly again!

https://discord.gg/FP8dQj6KBj

Name: Pewpew's Power Paths
Description:
Official open world Roller Beetle Racing paths designed to help you get an easy gold medal in each race following the exact racing path of "Masked Roller P" (Currently only primary Roller Beetle races, as well as a few difficult seasonal races. More to come in the future along with speed updates).

[TINY] discord server link: https://discord.gg/tinyarmy & website: https://tinyarmy.org/

Name: ReActif EN
Description: (English Version) Follow the trails to complete the map explorations (as well as masteries).\n\nThe trails are adapted to be able to be followed by having not all the masteries or the mounts. These are used only from the maps where the player can get them.

Name: ReActif FR
Description: (French Version) Follow the trails to complete the map explorations (as well as masteries).\n\nThe trails are adapted to be able to be followed by having not all the masteries or the mounts. These are used only from the maps where the player can get them.

Name: Rediche's WvW Marker Pack
Description:
Level up your World vs. World skills with the ultimate World vs. World Marker Pack!

Discord: https://gw2.link/discord
Github: https://github.com/rediche/rediche-wvw-pack

Name: Tear Token Pack
Description: A collection of trails for the ember bay Token Collector achievement.

Name: Teh's Trails - Map Completion
Description: A pack tailored for speedrunning map completion. It utilizes all mounts, waypoints, and a multitude of markers to help you complete maps as fast as possible. The current map comp world record of 6h48m uses this pack! Includes trails for Core Tyria and EoD, with HoT and PoF in progress.

Name: Teh's Trails - Hero Points
Description: This pack contains trails for speed-completing Hero Points either solo or in small groups. It is aimed at veteran players who have access to most masteries and want to quickly grab hero points for their new alt. Requires all mounts, prototype position rewinder, and jade waypoint.

Name: Tekkit's All-In-One
Description: Jack-of-all-trades with markers and trails for most content.
Categories: Festivals, Jumping Puzzles, Achievements, Gathering, Map Completion

Name: The Tryhard Marker Pack
Description: The Tryhard Marker Pack

Name: Tyria [DRFT]
Description:
This is Tyria Drift's [DRFT] main marker pack that compiles many [DRFT] racetracks made by [DRFT] members for GW2 players to try out. 

[DRFT] Discord server link: https://discord.gg/6gE5GYV

Name: Tyria [DRFT] Grand Prix
Description:
This GW2 TacO file compiles Tyria Drift's [DRFT] past Grand Prix events in a boundary trail format for GW2 players to experience the racetracks chosen for [DRFT]'s Grand Prix.

[DRFT] discord server link: https://discord.gg/6gE5GYV

Name: Zippy Ziplines
Description:
Light weight End of Dragons zipline paths with no extra fluff.

[TINY] discord server link: https://discord.gg/tinyarmy & website: https://tinyarmy.org/

Name: Lady Elyssa Taco Markers
Description: A collection of Markers and Trails for Guild Wars 2 by Lady Elyssa comprising of an estimated 400+ Trails and 5,000+ Markers. Suitable for use with GW2 TacO and Blish HUD.

Name: Teh's Trails - Map Completion NEW EXPANSION
Description: A pack tailored for speedrunning map completion. It utilizes all mounts, waypoints, and a multitude of markers to help you complete maps as fast as possible. The current map comp world record of 6h48m uses this pack! Includes trails for Core Tyria and EoD, with HoT and PoF in progress.
